title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When expanding the 'Data Source' in the 'Available Items' sector, the column icons do not appear.
EB: In the 'Available Items' sector, when expanding the 'Data Source' by clicking the related icon, the table icons and column icons should show up.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a new project. 
2. Create a new report. 
3. In the 'Data Explorer' view, create a new 'Data Source' to connect to a Derby database by providing the following information: 
    - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver 
    - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui 
    - User Name: root 
    - Password: root 
4. After setting up the 'Data Source', create a dataset. 
5. In the 'Edit Data Set' window, select 'Query'. 
6. [Include the missing steps to reproduce here]
